hero.title: Autowrite with Dictate AI
hero.description: Dictate AI offers fast and accurate transcriptions for meetings, interviews, and more. Ideal for professionals and teams who want to save time and focus on what matters. Your data is secure and GDPR-compliant.
hero.subDescription: Save up to 80% of your time on transcription. Start free now – no credit card required.
hero.socialProof: Already over 1,000 users save time daily

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions about Dictate AI
faq.description: Here you will find answers to the most important questions about Dictate AI, your intelligent assistant for converting speech to text.

item1.title: What exactly does Dictate AI do?
item1.description: Dictate AI is your clever helper that automatically converts spoken words into written text. Simply upload your audio recording (e.g., from meetings, interviews, lectures, or voice notes) and our artificial intelligence does the rest – quickly and reliably. This way, you get a written protocol or transcript in no time, without having to type yourself.

item2.title: Who is Dictate AI suitable for?
item2.description: Dictate AI is perfect for anyone who regularly needs to convert audio recordings into text and wants to save valuable time. This includes:
item2.professionals: Busy professionals: Effortlessly document meetings and phone calls.
item2.teams: Efficient teams: Quickly and easily share important conversation content in writing.
item2.students: Students: Convert lectures and study notes into searchable texts.
item2.journalists: Journalists & Podcasters: Quickly transcribe interviews and audio content.
item2.creators: Content Creators: Create subtitles or blog articles from your video and audio content.
item2.noteTakers: Anyone who takes notes: Easily capture spontaneous ideas and thoughts by voice.

item3.title: How does Dictate AI help me save time?
item3.description: Manually typing audio recordings is tedious and often takes hours of your precious time. Dictate AI completes this task in a fraction of the time. Instead of getting caught up in typing, you can focus on more important tasks, prepare your content faster, or analyze your results more quickly. This means: More productivity for you and less tedious routine work.

item4.title: Are my data safe with Dictate AI?
item4.description: Absolutely. Protecting your data is our top priority. We know how important confidentiality is. That's why we process all information strictly according to the requirements of the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). Your audio recordings and the texts created from them are safe and secure with us – you can count on that.

item5.title: How accurate are the transcriptions?
item5.description: Our artificial intelligence is trained to recognize speech very precisely and convert it into text. The accuracy is impressively high, especially with clearly understandable recordings of good sound quality. You get a solid text base that you can usually use directly or only need to minimally revise if necessary.

item6.title: What kind of audio recordings can I upload?
item6.description: You can upload a variety of audio recordings. Whether recordings of meetings, conducted interviews, recorded phone calls (if legally permissible!), lectures from the lecture hall, seminar recordings, podcast episodes, or simply spontaneously recorded voice notes with your phone – Dictate AI can process them. We support the most common audio formats.

item7.title: Is using Dictate AI complicated?
item7.description: No, quite the opposite! We have deliberately designed Dictate AI to be simple and intuitive. You don't need any technical knowledge or complicated training times. The process is very simple:
item7.step2: Wait a short time while our AI works.
item7.step3: Download or copy the finished text.
item7.conclusion: We want you to get started right away and benefit from the advantages!

faq.reachOutText: If you have any other questions or need further assistance, we're happy to help you with anything related to Dictate AI.

euStorage.title: Storage and Data Processing in the EU
euStorage.description: All your data is processed and stored exclusively on servers within the European Union. We rely on local infrastructure for maximum data security.

dsgvo.title: GDPR-compliant Data Storage
dsgvo.description: Your data is encrypted according to the highest security standards and stored in compliance with GDPR. We guarantee maximum data protection for your voice recordings.

processingModal.title: Just a moment... ☕
processingModal.description: Your transcription is being created. Our AI is working at full speed! This might take a little moment. Why not grab a coffee – we'll send you an email as soon as your text is ready.

fileSizeErrorModal.firstTimeUser: As a first-time user, you can upload files up to 2GB. Your file ({size}MB) is within the limit!

help.title: Help & Contact
help.subtitle: We're here to help you
help.description: Find quick answers to common questions or contact us directly.

howToUpload.question: How do I upload an audio file?
howToUpload.answer: Go to the transcription page, drag and drop your file or click on the upload area. We support MP3, WAV, MP4, M4A, AAC, and more formats.

supportedFormats.question: What file formats are supported?
supportedFormats.answer: We support most audio and video formats: MP3, WAV, MP4, M4A, AAC, OGG, OPUS, WEBM, and FLAC.

maxFileSize.question: What is the maximum file size?
maxFileSize.answer: Free users can upload files up to 100MB. First-time users and Pro subscribers can upload files up to 2GB.

processingTime.question: How long does transcription take?
processingTime.answer: Processing time depends on the length of your recording. Typically it takes a few minutes. You will receive an email once your transcription is ready.

changeSubscription.question: How can I change my subscription?
changeSubscription.answer: Go to Profile > Subscription to manage, upgrade, or cancel your plan.

howItWorks.title: How Dictate AI Works
howItWorks.description: Our process is simple, fast, and secure. Here's how it works:
howItWorks.uploadDescription: Simply drag and drop your audio file or select it from your device. We support all common audio formats.
howItWorks.transcriptionDescription: Our advanced AI processes your recording with high accuracy, converting speech to text in minutes.
howItWorks.secureProcessingDescription: Your data is processed securely on EU servers, fully compliant with GDPR regulations.
howItWorks.readyToUseDescription: Download your transcription or copy it directly to your clipboard. Your text is ready for immediate use.

integrations.softwareDescription: Connect Dictate AI with your existing software stack through our API or webhooks.
integrations.flexibilityDescription: Choose how you want to use Dictate AI - through our web interface, email, or API.
integrations.timeSavingDescription: Automate your workflow by integrating Dictate AI directly into your existing tools.
integrations.seamlessProcessesDescription: Maintain your current workflow while adding powerful transcription capabilities.
